verbs.description: The Trump administration [V: is] downplaying concerns about a possible low participation in the 2020 Census because it will include a citizenship question for the first time in 70 years .

[ARG0: The Trump administration] is [V: downplaying] [ARG1: concerns about a possible low participation in the 2020 Census] [ARGM-CAU: because it will include a citizenship question for the first time in 70 years] .
The Trump administration is downplaying concerns about a possible low participation in the 2020 Census because it [V: will] include a citizenship question for the first time in 70 years .

The Trump administration is downplaying concerns about a possible low participation in the 2020 Census because [ARG2: it] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: include] [ARG1: a citizenship question] [ARGM-TMP: for the first time in 70 years] .
